SEARCH
Package cocoa.controller

Class PetController

java.lang.Object
cocoa.controller.PetController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/pet") public class PetController extends Object
PetController is a REST controller for managing pet entities. It provides endpoints for creating, updating, deleting, and querying pet information.

      @PostMapping public R<String> save(@RequestBody PetDto petDto)
      Creates a new pet.
      Parameters:
      petDto - the data transfer object containing pet details
      Returns:
      a response indicating success or failure

    • page

      @GetMapping("/page") public R<com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.plugins.pagination.Page> page(@RequestParam int page, @RequestParam int pageSize, @RequestParam(required=false) String name)
      Retrieves a paginated list of pets based on the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number
      pageSize - the number of items per page
      name - an optional name to filter pets by
      Returns:
      a paginated list of pets wrapped in a response object

    • get

      @CachePut(value="userCache", key="#petDto.id") @GetMapping("/{id}") public R<PetDto> get(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves detailed information of a pet by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pet
      Returns:
      the detailed information of the pet wrapped in a response object

      Parameters:
      petDto - the data transfer object containing updated pet details
      Returns:
      a response indicating success or failure

    • list

      @GetMapping("/list") public R<List<PetDto>> list(Pet pet)
      Retrieves a list of pets matching the given query conditions.
      Parameters:
      pet - the query conditions
      Returns:
      a list of pets matching the conditions wrapped in a response object

      Parameters:
